description:
Legendary costumes for your Wei officers will be added.
Enjoy fighting battles in an all-new way.

■Content
Legendary Costumes for:
Xiahou Dun, Dian Wei, Cao Cao, Xu Zhu, Xiahou Yuan, Cao Ren, Cai Wenji, Jia Xu, Guo Jia, and Xun Yu

■How to use
You can change costumes from camp by selecting "Party" - "Select Costume".
name: Legendary Costumes Wei Pack 1
